duties_responsibilities.duty: Build project in accordance with all plans and specifications.
Develop a Grand Plan/Schedule of operation and effectively communicate to all employees.
Effectively utilize resources, i.e. people, equipment, and materials.
Supervise subcontractors (if applicable) to ensure quality and schedule requirements.
Review detail budget, time restraints, cost codes, and purchase control.
Review cost status report for accuracy and integrity. Investigate and take corrective action in areas of indicated or potential overruns.
Establish a level of quality by which all completed work is measured.
Responsible for day-to-day quality control of both company-performed / subcontractor work and ensure work conforms to Contract requirements and company standards.
Identify and correct non-conforming work expeditiously and competently.
In direct charge of safety and accident/incident control for the project. Understand, communicate and enforce safety policy on project at all times.
Effectively motivate employees to achieve desired results.
Establish positive relationships with owners, owner’s reps, architects, and engineers.

education_certification.credential: Working knowledge of standards, specifications, codes, regulations and laws
Good oral and written communication skills
